title: Colour bars
creator_credit: Fabio Cavadini, Mandy King and Auburn Community Development Network
brief_description: This non-observational documentary made for SBS Independent is about the lives of five young Australians of non-English Speaking Backgrounds. They were born or raised in Australia and have experienced the ups and downs of growing up in at least two cultures; that of their parents and the mainstream culture.
creator_credit_for_label: Fabio Cavadini, Mandy King and Auburn Community Development Network
